name: PVC Tanks Checklist

Must be below 5% to pass

Note ambient temp, Relative Humidity, Dew Point

Note batch numbers for products used
Equipment used
Note equipment used like rollers etc.
Substrate inspected and accepted
Substrate must be clean, smooth, dry and free from dust or contaminants. All sharp points and loose material to be removed

Application of PVC Sheet Membrane

Final Walk over and inspection by main contractor, Supplier and Appliactor if Applicable.
Test 1 Probe Test
Test 2 Air Test Test (if double seam weld is done otherwise revert test 1)
Works completed, area Tidy - builder signature attached below if applicable
